OperationId: get_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_global_config_etherchannel_misconfig_guard EtherChannel guard detects a misconfigured EtherChannel when interfaces on the switch are configured as an EtherChannel while interfaces on the other device are not or when not all the interfaces on the other device are in the same EtherChannel.
